      Methods in com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.scenes with parameters of type Scene.SceneState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Scene.onEnter(long deltaTime, Scene.SceneState state)
      Called just before updating all layers held by this scene and just after processing input events and calling updateStart and calling the start functions.
      protected void Scene.onExit(long deltaTime, Scene.SceneState state)
      Called just after updating all layers held by this scene and just before ending the update.
      void Layer.update(long deltaTime, Scene.SceneState state)
      Updates the layer depending on the state and then calls the update method for each sprite in this layer.
      abstract void Layer.updateOnState(long deltaTime, Scene.SceneState state)
      Updates this layer differently depending on the given scene state.
